dimension: H.6-7/8 x W.5-1/4 x D.3-1/2 in. (overall)
medium: porcelain, copper luster, sepia transfer decoration
title: Hot Water Pitcher, from Architects' Tea Set
description: ovoid form pitcher with short, wide neck; small high spout next to lid; lid has pink luster bird for handle; one side of pot decorated with image of North Church, New Haven; opposite side has eagle from U.S. Seal
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
